title: A table of humane passions With their causes and effects. Written by ye Reuerend Father in God F.N. Coeffeteau, Bishop of Dardania ... Translated into English by Edw. Grimeston Sergiant at Armes.
author: Coeffeteau, Nicolas, 1574-1623.
notes: A translation of: Tableau des passions humaines.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
